NK100(the)004:1: // snyan rgyud dpung pa'i don thems khrid kyi phyag bzhes
NK100(the)004:2: kyi yi ge rin po che'i 'phreng ba zhes bya
NK100(the)004:3: ba bzhugs // snang srid byang chub sems su 'du //
NK100(the)004:4: 'dzin pa rang grol ris med rtsi //
NK100(the)004:5: don rtogs 'gro ba kun gyi bla //
NK100(the)004:6: 'gro la bu bzhin sems pa'i ma //
NK100(the)004:7: don ldan zhig po sprul sku la //
NK100(the)004:8: zhabs kyi rdul la gus pas 'dud //
NK100(the)004:9: rin chen spungs pa la sogs pa'i //
NK100(the)004:11: khrid kyi phyag bzhes bla ma'i gsung //
NK100(the)004:12: sdebs te brjed thor bri bar bya //
NK100(the)004:13: rgyud pa'i bla ma gong ma rnams kyi khrid kyi phyag bzhes /
NK100(the)004:14: slob bu lam du blangs pa la /
NK100(the)004:16: chos bcu bzhi la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis /
NK100(the)004:21: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bla ma mnyes par byas /
NK100(the)004:22: gnas dben pa man ngag na bshad pa dang yid dang mthun par /
NK100(the)004:23: ston ser la sogs pa'i dus 'dzom pa la /
NK100(the)004:26: tshogs dang gtor ma bcas la thun mong dang khyad par gyi sems bskyed par bya'o //
NK100(the)004:27: de nas bla mas gdams ngag gdab ste /
NK100(the)004:30: lta ba nyams su myong ba dang /
NK100(the)004:31: lta ba ngo sprad pa dang /
NK100(the)004:32: lta ba lam du blang pa'o //
NK100(the)004:33: bzhi po 'di la sgom tshar nas 'ong ste /
NK100(the)004:34: de la dang po lta ba thabs kyis bzung ba ni /
NK100(the)004:35: tshogs gnas nas bsgom pa spyod lam la gdab pa yan chad do //
NK100(the)004:37: rten dang sbyar te rgyu tshogs la gnas pa dang /
NK100(the)004:38: rigs dang sbyar te rnal 'byor gyi zas bdun gyis khams brtas par bya ba'o //
NK100(the)004:41: de la lus tshogs la gnas pa ni /
NK100(the)004:42: 'jig rten gyi bya byed dang so nam rnams bshol te /
NK100(the)004:43: gal che ba'i lha phyag dang bskor ba la sogs kyang bshol /
NK100(the)004:44: bang dang 'gros drag po mi bya /
NK100(the)004:46: mig rgyang ring po ched du mi ldang /
NK100(the)004:47: gad kha dang g.yang mi sdad /
NK100(the)004:48: char rlung drag po'i gseb tu mi sdod /
NK100(the)004:49: mdor na mgo chags 'grams kyis dogs pa bzhin bya'o //
NK100(the)004:50: ngag gi 'jig rten gyi long gtam la sogs pa dang rnams kyang bshol te /
NK100(the)004:51: gal che ba'i mdo dang snying yang bshol la smra bcad bya'o //
NK100(the)004:52: lto dus 'dzar dus kyi gleng mo re re gnyis gnyis ni gnas /
NK100(the)004:54: yid tshogs la gnas pa ni /
NK100(the)004:55: 'khrul snang gi rtog dpyod nams kyang bshol te /
NK100(the)004:56: gal che ba'i chos kyi bsam mno yang bshol la /
NK100(the)004:57: mno bsam ci yang mi gtang /
NK100(the)004:58: mno bsam byung na 'byams su mi gzhug par 'phro sad sad bcad do //
NK100(the)004:66: de la rnam par shes pa'i zas ni /
NK100(the)004:67: mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs kyi rjes su mi 'brang /
NK100(the)004:68: mig gi dbang po glod la gzugs btang snyoms gzhag go //
NK100(the)004:69: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sgra'i rjes su mi 'brang /
NK100(the)004:70: rna ba'i dbang po glod la sgra btang snyoms su gzhag go //
NK100(the)004:71: sna'i rnam par shes pa dri'i rjes su mi 'brang /
NK100(the)004:72: sna'i dbang po glod la dri btang snyoms su bzhag
NK100(the)004:73: /lce'i rnam par shes pa ro'i rjes su mi 'brang
NK100(the)004:74: / lce'i dbang po glod la ro btang snyoms gzhag /lus reg bya'i rjes su mi 'brang /
NK100(the)004:75: lus glod la reg bya btang snyoms su gzhag go //
NK100(the)004:76: yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtog pa'i rjes su mi 'brang /
NK100(the)004:77: yid kyi dbang po glod la rtog pa btang snyoms su gzhag go //
NK100(the)004:78: de yang yid tshogs la gnas nas mno bsam ma skyes na sgo lnga btang snyoms su song /
NK100(the)004:79: sgo lnga btang snyoms su 'dug na yid tshogs la gnas nas 'ong ngo //
NK100(the)004:80: reg pa'i zas ni mal gos yin te /
NK100(the)004:81: grub na dar gos dang dar 'bol la sogs pa bya /
NK100(the)004:82: de ma grub kyang mal dang sngas 'bol ba /
NK100(the)004:83: gos 'jam pa yang ba dro bar bya'o //
NK100(the)004:84: kham gyi zas ni spungs pa las /
NK100(the)004:86: 'phrod la sna mang pa zhes pas /
NK100(the)004:87: spyir 'grangs pa la 'grangs grags pa min te tshod zin pa /
NK100(the)004:88: sha'i tsho'u dang chang dang bu ram la sogs te
NK100(the)004:89: khams dang 'phrod pa'i zas bcud sna mang du sum
NK100(the)004:91: dam pa'i zhal nas 'jig rten gyi she mo dang
NK100(the)004:92: zho sha 'dod pa las yang ci 'dod ltor 'brub
NK100(the)004:93: na / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ngo sprod /
NK100(the)004:94: gtan gyi so nam zin par byed pa yin pas /
NK100(the)004:96: ngo 'phrod nas lam zan dang ldom bu byas kyang chog gsum /
NK100(the)004:98: nyin par gnyid bro yang 'dug pa yongs kyi mi
NK100(the)004:99: log /nub mo'i gnyid zas yin pas tshim par log
NK100(the)004:100: /gnyid du ma song bar du tshogs gnas bya'o //
NK100(the)004:101: sems pa yid kyi zas ni /
NK100(the)004:102: nga la bsgom 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa bya mi dgos 'ong nges /
NK100(the)004:103: gzhan nas 'tshol ba min rang la yod pa ngo sprod pa yin /
NK100(the)004:104: ci 'dra yod snyam pa bya dgos /
NK100(the)004:105: ngo sprod kyi skabs su 'di yin bya ngo sprod do //
NK100(the)004:106: re dogs med par gnas par bya'o //
NK100(the)004:107: tshangs par spyod pa'i zas ni /
NK100(the)004:108: khrid 'di ma thob bar du lus rgyud na bsgom
NK100(the)004:109: par mi 'ong pas thig le ma nyams pa bya'o
NK100(the)004:110: // ting nge 'dzin zas ni kham gyi zas mi dgos pa dang /
NK100(the)004:111: khams kyi zas dang bral yang mdangs dang dbang po
NK100(the)004:112: gsal ba la sogs pa yin te khad dang mi
NK100(the)004:113: yis skye'o // de ltar tshogs gnas zas bdun po
NK100(the)004:114: de sde skor du ngo sprad de tshogs la ma
NK100(the)004:116: de la zhag re lon gyi dri ba bya ste /
NK100(the)004:120: 'gyur mang nyung ji tsam 'dug /ma 'gyus tsa na
NK100(the)004:121: ji ltar 'dug /skye ba'am 'tsher ba mi 'dug gam
NK100(the)004:122: dris la / gnyid yar ba dang mi khugs pa la sogs pa dang /
NK100(the)004:123: khams ma bde ba'i skyon byung na /
NK100(the)004:124: spyir rtags nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang bstun la bcos so //
NK100(the)004:125: rtog pa snga dro 'phro na tshogs la ma gnas la nan tan bya /
NK100(the)004:126: phyi dro ma gnas na khams kyi nub pa zhan pa yin pas zas gtang /
NK100(the)004:128: sngar rtogs pa ngos ma zin pa de der ngos
NK100(the)004:129: zin pas 'gyu ba mgo la mang du 'gro dgos
NK100(the)004:130: pa yin pas mi 'gyur zer na ngos ma zin
NK100(the)004:131: pa'i nyen yod pas nan tan bskyed do //
NK100(the)004:132: mi 'gyus tsa na gsal ba la had de thom me ba gcig dgos pa yin pa la /
NK100(the)004:133: shes pa mog gi mi 'gyu ba tsug 'dug na /
NK100(the)004:134: gnyid dam bying pa'i dbang du song nas ma tshor
NK100(the)004:135: ba yin nyes yod pas bag tsam gsengs la nan
NK100(the)004:136: tan bya / bying rgod bcos thabs gzhan dang yang bag re bstun no //
NK100(the)004:137: skyo'am 'tsher na shes pa 'khyogs pa bya ba yin pas /
NK100(the)004:138: de srong la dad pa la bskyed dgos pas /
NK100(the)004:141: bla ma la mos gus byas /
NK100(the)004:142: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la brod pa bskyed do //
NK100(the)004:143: de ltar nyams su blangs pas /
NK100(the)004:144: tshogs gnas la zhag grangs mi rtsi rtags pa blta'o //
NK100(the)004:145: gnas pa la rtags phyi lus la brtag pa ni /
NK100(the)004:146: sngar rtog pas khams bso byas pa de rtog pas 'phro bcad /
NK100(the)004:147: ting nge 'dzin gyi zas dang ma phrad pas lus ngal zhing dub pa dang /
NK100(the)004:149: gzhan gyis bltas kyang ha de thom me ba'o //
NK100(the)004:150: nang shes pa la brtag pa ni /
NK100(the)004:151: rtog med du had de thom me sdod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:152: 'o na de bsgom pa yin nam min zhe na /
NK100(the)004:153: yin kyang min te min kyang min /
NK100(the)004:154: rtog med kyi shes pa de gnas pa'i gzhi yin pas yin no //
NK100(the)004:155: de rung ngo ma sprad pas min no //
NK100(the)004:156: de yang bkra shis khu byug rgyud las /
NK100(the)004:157: bsam bya bsam par mi bya ste /
NK100(the)004:158: mi bsam par yang mi bya'o //
NK100(the)004:159: gang la rnam par mi sems pa /
NK100(the)004:160: de ni de bzhin mnyam nyid do //
NK100(the)004:163: bsam gtan nyid pas bsam du med //
NK100(the)004:164: ces pa'i don yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)004:165: de ltar tshogs la gnas nas de ni thun la 'jug par bya ste /
NK100(the)004:166: de la gnyis yar gyi 'phel bcu /
NK100(the)004:168: 'phel bcu la rlung dang thun gnyis las /
NK100(the)004:169: de la rlung ni sems 'dul zhes bya ba yin te /
NK100(the)004:170: de yang khams ngan pa dang /
NK100(the)004:171: na so rgan pa la 'jam rlung /
NK100(the)004:172: khams bzang po dang na so gzhon pa la drag
NK100(the)004:173: rlung bya bar bshad kyang phyag bzhes 'di ltar mdzad
NK100(the)004:174: do // de la gsum lus kyi gnad /
NK100(the)004:177: de la lus kyi gnad ni /
NK100(the)004:178: dkyil krung bde bar bcas lag pa pus mo'i steng du bkal cha khrims bya'o //
NK100(the)004:179: dmigs pa ni 'og nam mkha' stong pa la rgya
NK100(the)004:180: gdugs dkar po tog dang sham bu med pa cig
NK100(the)004:181: gi steng du rang tog gi tshul du yod par
NK100(the)004:182: bsam la / gdugs g.yon du 'khor bar bsam mo //
NK100(the)004:183: rlung ni dang po dug dbyung bya ste /
NK100(the)004:184: ha zhes khog pa nas rlung sangs kyis btang ba lan gsum bya /
NK100(the)004:185: de nas sna nas lan gsum bya /
NK100(the)004:186: de'i dgos pa rlung skyon mi 'ong ba'o //
NK100(the)004:187: de nas sbyang pa bya ste /
NK100(the)004:188: dbugs bsrings la gnyid du 'grol ma lta bu sna
NK100(the)004:189: nas phar 'phro tshur 'gro khug pa nyer gcig bya'o
NK100(the)004:190: // dgos pa rlung thag ring ba'o //
NK100(the)004:191: de nas sna nas rngubs te cher gyis mnan pa la thub tshad drag tu bzung ngo //
NK100(the)004:192: 'chor 'chor 'dra na drag du mnan te gdugs 'khor ba la dmigs pa drag tu gtad do //
NK100(the)004:193: drag rlung zin nas 'dar ba dang 'phar ba dang sprugs pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)004:194: de nas sna nas btang ste /
NK100(the)004:195: kha sna nas dug dbyung lan gsum gsum bya'o //
NK100(the)004:196: yang na lus gong dang 'dra ba las /
NK100(the)004:197: khyad par du mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya lte ba'i 'og tu bya'o //
NK100(the)004:199: lus ba ta'i rkyal pa bus pa lta bu dmar ltang nge stong sang nge yod par bsams la /
NK100(the)004:200: lte ba las sor bzhi bcal ba'i 'og na rlung
NK100(the)004:201: sems 'dres pa'i thig le 'od kyi rnam pa kha
NK100(the)004:202: dog sngo ba la reg bya tsha ba /
NK100(the)004:203: dper na g.yu sgong 'bar ma lta bu gcig /phar sgal pa la ma 'byar /
NK100(the)004:204: tshur gsus pa la ma 'byar bar hril li yod pa la dmigs pa gtod do //
NK100(the)004:205: rlung gong dang 'dra ba las khyad par 'og rlung
NK100(the)004:206: bag tsam bsdam mo de gnyis gang gsal la bya'o
NK100(the)004:207: // phyag bzhes su gong ma de thun brgyad yan chad la /
NK100(the)004:208: 'og ma de dgu pa dang bcu pa la mdzad kyi gada'o //
NK100(the)004:209: de ltar rlung de seng byas mthun bya ste /
NK100(the)004:210: lus ngag yid gsum lhod kyis glod la /
NK100(the)004:211: shes pa spro bsdus med pa /
NK100(the)004:213: btang gzhag med pa la 'bol le shig ge sog ma phon thag chad pa bzhin du gzhag go //
NK100(the)004:214: de yang tshad ni rab gom pa drug cu /
NK100(the)004:216: tha ma nyi shu'i bar ram /
NK100(the)004:217: yang na dbugs khugs pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
NK100(the)004:218: yang na spos me sor gcig gis tshod du /
NK100(the)004:219: slob bu bsgom du gzhug /dus thun tshad bzung ngo //
NK100(the)004:220: de nas thun gyi dngos po de btang la /
NK100(the)004:221: lus ngag yid gsum seng byas la /
NK100(the)004:222: rjes la gcer ba dar cig thun pa'i thung tsam zhig lta'o //
NK100(the)004:223: de ltar thun byed pa la bying nas bseng /
NK100(the)004:224: rgod na thun mgo la rgod na shes pa thang bcad /
NK100(the)004:225: zhabs la rgod na 'phro bcad de /
NK100(the)004:226: rlung la thun rkun mi bya /
NK100(the)004:227: thun la 'byams su mi gzhug gsung ngo //
NK100(the)004:228: de ltar nyi ma dang po la thun gcig /gnyis pa la gnyis /
NK100(the)004:232: drug pa la drug /bdun pa la bdun /
NK100(the)004:236: de nas nyi ma gcig thun ngal bso la /
NK100(the)004:237: tshogs gnas dang byug pa bya'o //
NK100(the)004:238: da ni mar gyi 'grib bya ste /
NK100(the)004:239: de yang lus kyi gnad ni tsog pur bya /
NK100(the)004:241: 'og rlung bag tsam 'then cha bsgrims la /
NK100(the)004:243: dug dbyung dang sbyang pa mi dgos /
NK100(the)004:244: rlung ni sum gnyis nang du bzung sum cha phyir
NK100(the)004:245: btang sna sgo las sor gnyis las ma 'das par
NK100(the)004:246: gtungs bya'o // thun tshad gang gi rlung dang mnyam /
NK100(the)004:247: de nas rnam snang gi chos bdun byas la glod pa dang rjes la blta bar bya'o //
NK100(the)004:248: nyi ma gnyis pa la lus tsog pu gong bzhin bya /
NK100(the)004:249: dmigs pa ni rlung sems 'dres pa'i thig le la
NK100(the)004:250: dud pa spos dud lta bu sngo nar gyis rlung
NK100(the)004:251: phyir 'gro ba dang bstun nas thon /
NK100(the)004:252: sna nas sor bzhi'i thad dkar mdud pa cig byas nas sor bzhi nas /
NK100(the)004:253: rlung tshur nang du 'ong pa dang bstun lte ba
NK100(the)004:254: nas bstungs bstungs thig le la thim par bsams la
NK100(the)004:255: / de ltar rlung khug pa nyer gcig bya'o //
NK100(the)004:256: glod pa dang rjes la lta ba mthun /
NK100(the)004:258: gcig gi nyul du song pa de byin po tsho la mnan la thun cher btang ngo //
NK100(the)004:260: gsum pa la kha dog dbyibs la gzung ste /
NK100(the)004:261: lus tsog pu'am chos bdun byas la /
NK100(the)004:262: mdun du dbyibs zlum po gcig bris /
NK100(the)004:263: dmigs pa'i rten dkar po gcig gzhag la sems phyir ma 'phros par gtad /
NK100(the)004:266: thun grangs brgyad byas la mnan pa 'dre /
NK100(the)004:267: bzhi pa la yi dam gang byed kyi thugs ka la gtad /
NK100(the)004:268: lnga pa la lus tsog pu /
NK100(the)004:269: dmigs pa sems can dang brag g.yang la sogs pa /
NK100(the)004:270: gang 'jigs pa la sems gzung la /
NK100(the)004:272: brag g.yang shin tu mtho ba /
NK100(the)004:273: bya skyibs can 'og nas chu rba klong 'phyo ba'i kha nas lhung la khad pa dang /
NK100(the)004:274: 'khron pa'i gting subs la khad nas bdag 'dug pa dang /
NK100(the)004:275: rba klong 'phyo ba'i ldem zam gyi kha nas lhung la khad pa dang /
NK100(the)004:276: sems can la 'dzin na dang po mdun na 'dug pa /
NK100(the)004:277: je nye la rkang pa yar 'dzegs brang kha nas
NK100(the)004:278: yar 'dzegs nas byung bas shin tu bred pa rang
NK100(the)004:280: glod pa dang rjes la lta ba kun 'dres /
NK100(the)004:281: grangs bdun byas la ches gtang /
NK100(the)004:282: de ltar dmigs pa spos shing bya /
NK100(the)004:283: thun grangs lnga pa la drug /drug pa la lnga /
NK100(the)004:287: bcu pa la gcig bya ste grangs nyung du btang thun cher gtang ste /
NK100(the)004:288: phyi dag ma thun gcig tu gtong ngo //
NK100(the)004:289: de yang thun de rnams kyi dmigs pa ni /
NK100(the)004:290: spungs pa nas dbyibs dang kha dog dang /
NK100(the)004:293: gtang snyoms dang man ngag la sogs pa bag chags gang yod la spos shig bya'o //
NK100(the)004:294: glod pa dang rjes la lta ba kun la 'adre'o //
NK100(the)004:295: dam pa ni mar gyi 'grib bcu yang rlung rang du mdzad gsung /
NK100(the)004:296: rin po che ni thun ltab tu mdzad nas 'phel
NK100(the)004:297: 'grib gnyis ka zhag bcu la rdzogs par mdzad do
NK100(the)004:298: // thun bar du tshogs gnas ni shes pa 'phang stod rgya bskyed la bun ne long nge bya'o //
NK100(the)004:299: de yang gsang ba skor rgyud las /
NK100(the)004:300: snang ba kha yod khong stong la /
NK100(the)004:301: rnam shes bun ne long ngo zhog /gang la bzhag pa'i sa na bde'i don yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)004:302: dmigs pa dang glod pa dang rjes la lta ba gsum ni /
NK100(the)004:303: dmigs pa dag la rten nas ni /
NK100(the)004:304: mi dmigs pa ni skye bar 'gyur /
NK100(the)004:305: mi dmigs pa la bsten nas ni /
NK100(the)004:306: shin tu mi dmigs skye bar 'gyur /
NK100(the)004:307: zhes pa'i don yin gsung ngo //
NK100(the)004:308: thun la zhugs nas dri ba bya ba ni /
NK100(the)004:313: rjes la lta ba legs sam /
NK100(the)004:316: gnyid yar ba la sogs pa dang /
NK100(the)004:317: khams mi bde na bcos thabs bya /
NK100(the)004:318: dmigs pa mi gsal na spos la gang gsal la bya /
NK100(the)004:319: glod pa thun mgo la ma bde na shes pa thang bcad /
NK100(the)004:320: thun zhabs la ma bde na 'phro bcad /
NK100(the)004:321: rjes la lta ba la gsal che ba zhig dgos /
NK100(the)004:322: de ma byung na dpang stod /
NK100(the)004:323: tshogs la ma gnas na bcos pa gong dang 'dra /
NK100(the)004:324: mar gyi 'grib bcu'i zhabs na mar /
NK100(the)004:325: gong gi lung de rnams 'dzin du bcug kyi don
NK100(the)004:326: 'grol du gzhug /sems mi gzung par nam mkha' mtha'
NK100(the)004:327: 'tshol ba dang / sems phyogs bcur spro ba la sogs pa yang byed du gzhug go //
NK100(the)004:328: de rnams ni blo khams rab kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
NK100(the)004:329: blo khams 'bring la so thub tu bya'o //
NK100(the)004:330: blo khams tha mas la thun grangs nyung pa dang thun bskyungs la bya'o //
NK100(the)004:331: de yang tshogs gnas kyi skabs su rlung zin pas sems zin nas rlung 'khrugs pa'i rtags dang /
NK100(the)004:332: thun gyi skabs su yang dang khams 'khrugs pa'i rtags byung na bsgom ngal bso ste bcos dgos so //
NK100(the)004:333: de yang spyi rtags nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang bstun nas bcos pa logs na gsal lo //
NK100(the)004:334: de ltar thun rdzogs nas 'di ngo sprod do //
NK100(the)004:337: sems 'dzin gyi man ngag /sems 'dzin gyi thabs khyad par can no //
NK100(the)004:338: de la lta ba ni ya tha rgyal ba nas
NK100(the)004:339: tha dmyal ba yan chad la sems gzung du mi
NK100(the)004:341: dad gus can bla ma dang yi dam la bzung
NK100(the)004:342: pas chog /zhe sdang can dgra la bzung pas chog
NK100(the)004:343: / 'dod chags can 'gro ba bzang po dang bzang mo la bzung pas chog /
NK100(the)004:344: 'di la skyes pa bud med can //
NK100(the)004:345: mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsung //
NK100(the)004:347: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang //
NK100(the)004:348: byang chub chen po'i lam nas byung //
NK100(the)004:350: de la sogs te gang la bzung kyang gzung du btub bo //
NK100(the)004:351: de la dgos pa ni sems 'dzin phyogs gcig gi zhen pa grol nas /
NK100(the)004:352: gzhan yid dam lha 'am rtsa rlung la sogs pa la gzung na legs zer ba byung na /
NK100(the)004:353: sems gang la gzung du btub 'dra snyam nas yid mi 'gyur ba'i dgos pa'o //
NK100(the)004:354: bsgom pa ni ci mthong pa la sems ye nas zin nas 'dug pas /
NK100(the)004:355: gang gnas pa de rang la zin nas yod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:356: dgos pa ni sems ma zin gyis dogs pa dang bral /
NK100(the)004:357: shes bya kha phyir rgyud du mi 'chor /
NK100(the)004:358: dus thams cad du bsgom du gnas pa'o //
NK100(the)004:359: man ngag ni cir snang sems yin pa la yin par thag chod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:360: de'i dgos pa ni snang pa rang rgyud du mi 'chor ro //
NK100(the)004:361: de rnams bzung la nyams len 'di la bya ste /
NK100(the)004:362: sems 'dzin thabs khyad par can ni /
NK100(the)004:363: shes pa yul la 'phro ba dgug mi dgos /
NK100(the)004:365: ched du mi spro ched du mi dgug /gang 'phros
NK100(the)004:366: de'i steng du ci tsam sdod pa re gzhag /yang
NK100(the)004:367: de min cig tu 'phro na de rang du tsan
NK100(the)004:368: gyis gzhag go // de yang gtor ma lta bu
NK100(the)004:369: mthong na gtor ma lta bu la ji tsam gnas
NK100(the)004:370: pa de gzhag /de nas ka pa li lta bu
NK100(the)004:371: la 'phos na mi dgag par de rang la gzhag
NK100(the)004:372: gyis gzhag go // go // snang ba thams cad 'dres /
NK100(the)004:373: sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg gang la yang des 'dre /
NK100(the)004:374: dgos pa ci yod na snang ba dang bsgom pa 'dres /
NK100(the)004:375: mthong thos la sogs pa bsgom par ma gyur pa med do //
NK100(the)004:376: da ni bsgom pa spyod lam la gdab pa bstan te /
NK100(the)004:377: gong gi tshig tsho'i dri ba yang bya /
NK100(the)004:379: kha yan nas bsgom 'ong ngam mi 'ong snyam pa bya mi dgos 'ong nges /
NK100(the)004:380: rang la yod pa ngo sprod /
NK100(the)004:381: ji 'dra yod snyam pa bya mi dgos 'di yin bya ba ngo sprod bya ba kha nas /
NK100(the)004:382: rang gi sems gsal la rtog pa med pa /
NK100(the)004:383: gsal la 'dzin pa med pa'i shes pa sa le sang nge ba 'adi'o //
NK100(the)004:385: rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku /
NK100(the)004:388: sangs rgyas rang sems rtog pa bral ba yin //
NK100(the)004:390: de bsgom pa yin pas spyod lam la gdab ste /
NK100(the)004:391: za ba yang stong gsal nam mkha' lta bu /
NK100(the)004:392: 'gro yang sdod kyang nyal yang 'bral med du nyams su blang ngo //
NK100(the)004:393: za'i yang de dang 'bral yang mi 'bral lta /
NK100(the)004:396: res 'phyong res rgyugs kyi yang de dang 'bral lam mi 'bral lta /
NK100(the)004:397: sngar gyi mtshan bcas kyi chos spyod tshogs kyang gsal
NK100(the)004:398: stong 'dzin med kyi ngang dang ma bral bar spyad
NK100(the)004:399: do // dgod pa dang ngu ba dang gleng mo
NK100(the)004:400: la sogs pa ci byed kyang ma bral bar 'dug
NK100(the)004:401: na bsgom pa spyod lam la thebs pa'o //
NK100(the)004:402: de ltar ma thebs na shes pa thang bcad la goms 'dris cher bya'o //
NK100(the)004:403: de ltar spyod lam bzhi ka la btab kyi nyams len drag tu bya /
NK100(the)004:404: tha ma yang thun bzhi la chag thabs med gsung ngo //
NK100(the)004:405: da lta ba thabs kyi bzung pa le'u dang po'o
NK100(the)004:406: ////da ni lta ba nyams su myong ba ston te
NK100(the)004:407: / de la chos spyi lto dang bstun pa'i nyams rim pa lnga /
NK100(the)004:408: sems zin pa rtags kyi nyams drug /ting nge 'dzin shas che ba'i nyams lnga /
NK100(the)004:409: shes rab shas che ba'i nyams lnga'o //
NK100(the)004:410: de la dang po lnga ni /
NK100(the)004:411: dang po g.yo ba'i nyams ni ri gzar gyi kha nas chu 'bab pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:412: shes pa rnam rtog gi steng du 'bo' zhing 'gyes pa 'ong ste /
NK100(the)004:413: res gzhag kyang mi sdod par bun bun 'gro /
NK100(the)004:414: res ma gzhag kyang me re sdod pa 'ong ngo //
NK100(the)004:415: de nyams su cang 'gro 'am zhe na /
NK100(the)004:416: sngar rtog pa la 'gro ba la 'gro bar ma shes la /
NK100(the)004:417: da de ltar shes pas nyams su 'gro ba yin no //
NK100(the)004:418: thob pa'i nyams ni rang gi shes pa thang chod na bying rgod kyi dbang du mi 'agro'o //
NK100(the)004:419: de'i dus su ting nge 'dzin gyi ro chags kyang 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)004:420: yal rgyu med kyang yal snyam byed /
NK100(the)004:421: 'chor rgyu med kyang 'chor ba snyam byed /
NK100(the)004:422: goms pa'i nyams ni ring gi shes pa btang snyoms su gzhag pas /
NK100(the)004:423: gzugs sgra la sogs pa'i rkyen med na mi 'phro ba'o //
NK100(the)004:424: brtan pa'i nyams ni rkyen dbang du mi 'gro ste /
NK100(the)004:425: rkyen byung yang mi gnod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:426: mthar phyin pa'i nyams ni ra ro ba dang /
NK100(the)004:427: brgyal ba dang gnyid du song ba'i dus su yang bsgom du byung ngo //
NK100(the)004:429: lcags dbubs su 'dus pa lta bu ni /
NK100(the)004:430: dper na chu yur bar 'gro 'phro la /
NK100(the)004:431: lcags sbubs kyis rngubs pas yar khyil gyis 'ong pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:432: gong du rig pa yul la yan pa de khyim gyis sdod /
NK100(the)004:434: me stag 'phro ba lta bu ni /
NK100(the)004:435: mun khung du me stag 'phros pas snang ba kam kem gsal ba bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:436: sems mi 'phro bar mi rtog pa kam kem 'char ba'o //
NK100(the)004:437: bye phrug la ser bus rgyab pa lta bu ni /
NK100(the)004:438: dper na bye phrug ma'i gshogs pa'i 'og na yod tsa na bde 'bol le bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:439: 'o ma'i kha phrus btab pa ltar bde 'bol le ba 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)004:440: ma gzhan la song pas bye phrug la ser bus rgyab pas 'dar ba bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:441: rlung zin pas lus 'dar ba dang 'phar ba dang sprug pa la sogs 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)004:442: rus sbal 'khar gzhong du bzhag pa lta bu ni /
NK100(the)004:443: rus sbal 'khar gzhong du bzhag pas 'khungs kyang ma thar bar tse ne sdod pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:444: rig pa 'phros kyang gzungs ma rnyed par tse ne gnas pa'o //
NK100(the)004:445: rgun 'brum brdal pa lta bu ni /
NK100(the)004:447: rgun 'brum nyi ma la gros pas zhu ste /
NK100(the)004:448: zho rkyal ltar me re gnas pa bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:449: rig pa me re gang du yang mi 'phro bar gnas pa'o //
NK100(the)004:450: rtsi shing gi kha nas rlung 'phyo ba lta bu ni /
NK100(the)004:451: dper na rlung gis rtsi shing bskyod pas shu shu 'dug kyang /
NK100(the)004:452: rlung la rang bzhin med pas /
NK100(the)004:453: shing gar yang ma song ba bzhin du /
NK100(the)004:454: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya la sogs pa cir snang yang gnod pa ma skyel te /
NK100(the)004:456: sgra grags stong dri tshor stong ro bro stong /
NK100(the)004:457: reg stong dbyer med du shes pa'o //
NK100(the)004:458: ting nge 'dzin shas che ba'i nyams lnga ni /
NK100(the)004:459: shin tu sbyangs pas 'jam rtsub gnyis kyis lus sems la cher khyab pa ste /
NK100(the)004:460: sbyangs pa 'jam pa ni lus la 'o ma'i kha phrul btab pa ltar bde 'bol le /
NK100(the)004:461: rtsub pa ni 'dar ba dang sprugs pa sogs pa
NK100(the)004:462: de gnyis kyi lus sems la ches khyab pa dang
NK100(the)004:463: / nyams myong de 'dzin che zhing mi rtog pa mthug la brtan pa dang /
NK100(the)004:464: nyams de gdam pa'am sbrid pa snyam byed de gtang dka' ba dang /
NK100(the)004:465: lus sems 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i phyogs su bskol du mi 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)004:466: rtog pa byung tshor sna tshogs kyi rjes su rig pa mi 'brang ba'o //
NK100(the)004:467: shes rab shas che ba'i nyams lnga ni rtog pa
NK100(the)004:468: 'di yin gyi ngos gzung gi rnam pa med la
NK100(the)004:469: / yid klong klong ba'i g.yo bag can du 'dug pa dang /
NK100(the)004:470: chos kyi don la rtog dpyod gnyis kyi shas che bar 'byung ba dang /
NK100(the)004:471: thams cad sems stong gsal du 'dug pa la ting
NK100(the)004:472: nge 'dzin bya sgyu ma de 'dug snyam nas ting
NK100(the)004:474: chos kyi snang ba sngar ma shes pa dang /
NK100(the)004:475: mi shes pa'i lung zab mo yang 'char ba dang /
NK100(the)004:476: snang spyod thams cad sems kyi de kho na nyid du shes shing rtog pa 'byung ngo //
NK100(the)004:477: de ltar nyams kyi rim pa'i de rnams /
NK100(the)004:478: phar cher nyams su len pa'i dus su khyed rang la skyes nas yod pa ngos zin par bya'o //
NK100(the)004:479: de rnams skyes na lta ba nyams su myong ba yin no //
NK100(the)004:480: tha ma la yang 'ga' zung mi skye mi srid do //
NK100(the)004:481: de ni lta ba nyams su myong ba'i le'u gnyis
NK100(the)004:482: pa'o ////da ni lta ba ngo sprod pa'i gdams nga
NK100(the)004:484: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan tsho ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:485: de yang rang gi rig pa gsal stong 'di ngo
NK100(the)004:486: sprad na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal dus gcig
NK100(the)004:487: la mthong ste / rdo rje sems dpa' ni rig
NK100(the)004:488: pa gsal la rtog pa med pa 'di ka zer
NK100(the)004:489: la mthong ste / te / de 'gyur ba med pas rdo rje /
NK100(the)004:490: gsal la rtog pa med pas rdo rje sems dapa'o //
NK100(the)004:491: de las dgos 'dod 'byung bas rin chen 'byung ldan /
NK100(the)004:492: rig pa byang chub sems kyi snang ba de mtha' yas pas /
NK100(the)004:493: des bdag gzhan gyi don grub pas don yod grub pa /
NK100(the)004:494: thams cad rang gi sems nyid kyi rnam par snang bas /
NK100(the)004:496: des bdud bzhi thub pas sh+aakya thub pa /
NK100(the)004:497: 'gyur ba med pas phyag na rdo rje /
NK100(the)004:498: de sdug bsngal gyi zug rngu dang bral bas 'jam dpal /
NK100(the)004:499: rig pa'i rtsal snang cir yang 'char bas thugs rje chen po /
NK100(the)004:500: phyogs gang du yang mi g.yo bas mi g.yo ba /
NK100(the)004:501: de la sogs ti zhi ba thams cad rnam rtog zhi ba /
NK100(the)004:502: khro bo thams cad nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa /
NK100(the)004:503: sku mdog nag po thams cad sems nyid mi 'gyur ba /
NK100(the)004:504: ser po yon tan rgyas pa /
NK100(the)004:505: dmar po thugs rje chags pa /
NK100(the)004:506: dkar po skyon gyis ma gos pa /
NK100(the)004:507: phyag mtshan mtshon cha thams cad nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa /
NK100(the)004:508: de la sogs te sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thams cad /
NK100(the)004:509: rang gi sems nyid yin te /
NK100(the)004:510: sangs rgyas thams cad du rang sems shar bar shes pa'o //
NK100(the)004:511: de ltar shes pas rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas
NK100(the)004:512: thams cad zhal dus gcig la mthong ba'i dgos pa
NK100(the)004:513: yod do // chos kyi mtshan ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:514: rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che /
NK100(the)004:515: zhes bya ba yang sems rang gsal rtog med las gzhan med de /
NK100(the)004:517: gsal la rtog pa med pas sems dpa' /
NK100(the)004:518: mtha' dbus med pas nam mkha' /
NK100(the)004:519: gong nas med pa che ba'o //
NK100(the)004:520: chos thams cad kyi byed pa rang sems yin pas kun byed /
NK100(the)004:521: thams cad zil gyis gnon pas rgyal po /
NK100(the)004:522: de ngo mtshar bas rmad du byung ba /
NK100(the)004:523: rtogs na 'khor ba rang sar dag pas 'khor ba rtsad gcod /
NK100(the)004:524: thams cad de ru 'dus pas mdo bcu /
NK100(the)004:526: rtogs na 'khor ba rnams 'joms pas rnam 'joms /
NK100(the)004:527: ye nas gnas pa'i don shes pas 'da' ka ye shes /
NK100(the)004:528: de rtogs na sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la spyod par bzang po spyod pa /
NK100(the)004:529: gsal la rtog pa med pa la ltung ba mi gnas pas byang chub ltung bshags /
NK100(the)004:530: ma nor ba'i don shes pas shes rab /
NK100(the)004:532: thams cad sems las logs pa med par sdud pa /
NK100(the)004:533: zug rngu dang bral bas 'jam dpal /
NK100(the)004:534: mtha' dang bral bas dbu ma /
NK100(the)004:536: sgrib g.yogs med pas mngon pa /
NK100(the)004:540: thams cad bskyed pas pha rgyud /
NK100(the)004:541: de la sogs te chos thams cad kyi mtshan ji ltar brtags kyang /
NK100(the)004:542: rang sems gsal rtog med pa 'di nyid do //
NK100(the)004:543: des chos thams cad du ma ro gcig tu gnas pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK100(the)004:544: chos spyi lto gung mthun du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:546: sems nyid ngos bzung dang bral ba 'di nyid /
NK100(the)004:548: snang ba chos nyid bdag nyid /
NK100(the)004:551: sems nyid ngos bzung dang bral ba /
NK100(the)004:556: blo ngo bo nyid du grol ba /
NK100(the)004:557: yul yul can med par rang grol ba'o //
NK100(the)004:563: gzhi lhun gyis grub pa ngos gzung dang bral ba /
NK100(the)004:564: ngo bo nges pa med pa rang snang ba lam skye ba med pa gnyis su med pa /
NK100(the)004:565: bdag nyid thog mtha' dang bral ba rang grol lo //
NK100(the)004:566: bcom pa sems nyid ngos gzung dang bral ba /
NK100(the)004:569: a skye med ngos gzung bral ba /
NK100(the)004:570: ti 'gag med par snang yo ga gnyis su med pa'o //
NK100(the)004:571: de ltar gtan tshigs sam mtshon byed kyi tshig ji ltar btags kyang /
NK100(the)004:572: snang stong gnyis med 'di mtshon pa la gzhan med de /
NK100(the)004:573: des chos gcig shes kun la mkhas pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK100(the)004:574: gshis gnas lugs skye 'gag dbyer med du sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:576: snang pa sems su ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:578: stong pa gnyis med du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:579: gnyis med rang grol du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:580: snang ba sems su ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:582: 'khor ba ni phyi snod 'byung ba lngar snang ba dang /
NK100(the)004:583: nang bcud rigs drug tu snang ba dang /
NK100(the)004:584: rang gi rgyud la skye ba dug lnga dang /
NK100(the)004:586: 'das pa'i snang ba sku dang ye shes snang ba'o //
NK100(the)004:587: bal lam pa'i snang pa gzhan du gsung /
NK100(the)004:589: de sems su ngo sprad pa la /
NK100(the)004:590: 'byung lnga skye med rang 'byung du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:591: rigs drug skye med rang byung du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:592: dug lnga dus gsum skye med rang byung du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:593: 'das pa skye med rang 'byung du ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:594: lam pa skye med rang 'byung du ngo sprad pa'o //
NK100(the)004:595: de 'byung du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:596: lus kyi 'dug stangs legs par byas la /
NK100(the)004:597: stong gsal gyi ngang la glod /
NK100(the)004:598: de'i ngang las chu chen po brug nas byung ste /
NK100(the)004:599: snang srid thams cad chus khengs te rang yang khyer la khad pa ched du bsgom /
NK100(the)004:601: de nas me dang rlung dang sa dang nam mkha' yang yang /
NK100(the)004:602: de bzhin du sems drag tu gdab kyi glod /
NK100(the)004:603: de ltar 'byung ba lngar kyang rang sems ma bcos pa de nyid de ltar snang ba yin no //
NK100(the)004:604: rigs drug skye med rang 'byung du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:605: sems ma bcos par glod pa'i ngang las /
NK100(the)004:606: grangs pa'i dmyal ba lus bu chung lta bu la gos med par 'khyags pas /
NK100(the)004:609: skad kyi hud ces zlos pa dang /
NK100(the)004:611: so og ma la 'thams pa dang /
NK100(the)004:612: lus ud pal ltar gas pa dang /
NK100(the)004:613: pad ma ltar gas pa dang /
NK100(the)004:614: pad ma ltar cher gas pa dang /
NK100(the)004:616: lcags kyi khang rom 'bar ba na /
NK100(the)004:617: dmyal ba ri'i bar du 'char ba dang /
NK100(the)004:618: thig nag pos btab nas so les 'gra ba dang /
NK100(the)004:619: lcags kyi sa gzhi me rab tu 'bar ba la
NK100(the)004:620: bzhag nas lcags kyi tho bas rdul du bun bun
NK100(the)004:621: brdung ba dang / lcags kyi sha la ma ri
NK100(the)004:622: la ngu zhing 'bod pa pas yar 'gro mar 'gro
NK100(the)004:623: brdung ba dang / byed pa dang / zangs rgya
NK100(the)004:624: khal tshad ma'i nang du 'tshad cing snying la me
NK100(the)004:625: rab 'bar ba la sogs pa ched du bsgoms la
NK100(the)004:626: brdung ba dang / byed pa dang / glod do // de'i ngang las yi dwags kyi gnas /
NK100(the)004:627: lus dang dbang po mi 'tshams pa dang /
NK100(the)004:631: gsus pa rgal tshigs la 'byar ba /
NK100(the)004:632: shin tu sdug pa bsgom mo //
NK100(the)004:636: spu thog dang bye brag mi 'dra ba mang po gcig la gcig za ba dang /
NK100(the)004:637: la la ni ma nus bzhin du 'khol /
NK100(the)004:639: la la'i spu 'bregs pa la sogs pa ched du bsgom la glod do //
NK100(the)004:641: ri mtho ba gang ris bskor ba /
NK100(the)004:642: de'i 'dab na spang dang nags yod pa /
NK100(the)004:643: ri thang mtshams na ne bseng la rta phyugs mang po yod pa /
NK100(the)004:644: thang la zhing bzang po yod pa chu che ba /
NK100(the)004:645: ri thang mtshams na mkhar khyim can bzang po yod pa /
NK100(the)004:646: khyim thams cad ka cha shin tu phyug pa /
NK100(the)004:647: go kha thams cad zangs spyad du khra le ba /
NK100(the)004:648: skyes pa dang bud med thams cad gos dang rgyan phun sum tshogs pa las /
NK100(the)004:649: na ma lan cig drag grags te ma 'chams nas 'khrug pa byas pas /
NK100(the)004:651: khang khyim 'gyel shin tu sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa ched du bsgoms pa yang glod //
NK100(the)004:653: rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs /
NK100(the)004:656: pho mo thams cad gzugs byad shin tu legs pa /
NK100(the)004:658: rgyan dang bcas bsdar shin tu tho ba /
NK100(the)004:659: glu dang rol mo la shin tu dga' ba /
NK100(the)004:660: dper na ltad mo chen po lta bu gcig bsam /
NK100(the)004:663: 'thab cing rtsod pa 'khrugs pa 'ba' zhig byed pa /
NK100(the)004:668: dper na 'khrugs pa chen po'i tshams lta bu bsams la shes pa drag tu gtad /
NK100(the)004:669: de nas yang rtog med kyi ngang la lhwad kyis glod la gzhag go //
NK100(the)004:670: 'das pa skye med rang 'byung du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:671: de'i ngang la 'og min gyi gnas lha'i gzhal yas khang /
NK100(the)004:672: rin po che lnga las grub pa /
NK100(the)004:673: nang nas bltas pas phyi gsal phyi nas bltas na nang gsal ba'i nang na /
NK100(the)004:674: rin po che'i gdan stengs na /
NK100(the)004:675: lha rum me bzhugs pa la rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
NK100(the)004:676: lha khang gsal pa lta bu ched du bsgom /
NK100(the)004:677: de'i ngang las gsal la rtog med la glod gzhag
NK100(the)004:678: /de ltar stong gsal gyi ngang las 'byung lnga rigs
NK100(the)004:679: drug la sogs pa gang bsgom su snang ste /
NK100(the)004:680: snang ba'i dus na de rnams logs na med de
NK100(the)004:681: rtog med de nyid de ltar bsams pas snang ba
NK100(the)004:682: yin no // mtshon nas phyi snod 'byung ba lnga ru 'dzin pa /
NK100(the)004:685: lam lta bsgom la sogs su 'dzin pa thams cad
NK100(the)004:686: sems nyid rtog med de ka de ltar snang ba
NK100(the)004:687: yin no // sems las ma gtogs pa'i de rnams logs na grub pa med de /
NK100(the)004:688: de las logs pa 'dug pa na gang na 'dug
NK100(the)004:689: ji 'dra 'dug /rang sems med pa'i 'byung ba lnga
NK100(the)004:691: lnga dus gsum rtog pa gang na 'dug /sangs rgyas
NK100(the)004:692: sku dang ye shes gang na 'dug /lam pa'i lta
NK100(the)004:693: mkhan bsgom mkhan chos nyan mkhan bshad mkhan /
NK100(the)004:695: glog mkhan gang na 'dug ltos dang /
NK100(the)004:696: de las logs pa gcig 'dug na 'di yin bya ba smros byas la /
NK100(the)004:697: gzhig mal rtog spyod drag tu byed du bcug la /
NK100(the)004:698: snang ba sems su ngo ma phrad kyi bar du /
NK100(the)004:699: tshig gi sgros zhib mo mi dgos don go blangs kyi ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:700: gzhan yang gdab pa'i lugs kyis snang srid nges med la sogs pa dang /
NK100(the)004:701: snyan rgyud chen po'i rmi lam gyi de bas ngo sprad pa la stsogs pa dang /
NK100(the)004:702: dpe dang lung du ma'i mgo nas /
NK100(the)004:703: 'byung ba la sogs pa phyi rol du ma lus /
NK100(the)004:704: sems nang ma lus snang sems khrug ge ba 'di ngo ma 'phrod kyi bar du sprad do //
NK100(the)004:705: rgyud la yang de lta bu cig skye dgos so //
NK100(the)004:706: sems stong par ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:707: snang pa sems su ngo sprad nas sems kyis sems
NK100(the)004:708: la bltas pas kha dog gi ngos nas dkar dmar
NK100(the)004:709: du grub bam / gru bzhi zlum po la sogs pa'i dbyings su grub bam /
NK100(the)004:710: mtshan gyi ngos nas pho mo ma ning du grub bam /
NK100(the)004:711: gnas pa gang na 'dug byung ba gang na 'dug /
NK100(the)004:712: 'gro sa gang na 'dug /rtogs dpyod zhib du mthong /
NK100(the)004:713: de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mkhan po de rang la yang ngos gzung 'dug gam mi 'dug ltos /
NK100(the)004:714: snang zhing srid pa 'byung pa lnga /
NK100(the)004:715: rigs drug rang gi rgyud la skye ba'i dug lnga /
NK100(the)004:716: dus gsum rtog pa dus gsum sangs rgyas /
NK100(the)004:717: lam lta bsgom la stsogs pa thams cad rang bzhin
NK100(the)004:718: grub pa 'dug gam mi 'dug ltos shig byas la
NK100(the)004:719: / de ltar ma shes kyi bar du dpe don du ma'i sgo nas ngo sprad do //
NK100(the)004:720: stong pa gnyis med du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:721: de ltar snang ba rang snang 'dug pa de dang /
NK100(the)004:722: sems nyid ngos gzung dang bral ba de gcig tu 'dug gam /
NK100(the)004:723: tha dad du 'dug gzhig mal rtag spyod thong dang byas la /
NK100(the)004:725: snang sdo ba'i dus na ngos gzung dang bral /
NK100(the)004:726: ngos gzung dang bral ba de nyid rang snang ste /
NK100(the)004:727: de gnyis tshig tu re mos brjod kyang don la
NK100(the)004:728: gcig tu go ste snang stong dbyer med du ngo
NK100(the)004:730: de yul gnyis med dang yul can blo gnyis su
NK100(the)004:731: med na rang grol zin pas gnyis med rang grol
NK100(the)004:733: de ltar gnyis med de yul can chos nyid du byas nas blos bsgom mo //
NK100(the)004:734: gnyis med rang grol du ngo sprad pa ni /
NK100(the)004:735: gnyis med yul du byas nas lta zhing bsgom na bsgom mkhan de su ru 'dug na rang sems /
NK100(the)004:736: sems de ngos bzung dang bral te stong pa /
NK100(the)004:737: de snang stong dbyer med rang grol chen por ngo sprad do //
NK100(the)004:738: de ltar ngo sprad pas thag chod bzhi nang nas skyes te /
NK100(the)004:739: snang ba sems su ngo sprad pas snang ba sems su thag chod de /
NK100(the)004:740: snod 'byung ba lnga yang rang sems /
NK100(the)004:741: bcud rigs drug sems can yang rang sems /
NK100(the)004:742: dug lnga dang dus gsum rtog pa yang rang sems /
NK100(the)004:743: lta bsgom la sogs pa yang rang sems su thag rbad kyis chod do //
NK100(the)004:744: sems la sogs pa'i snang ba phyi nang rol du ma lus /
NK100(the)004:746: snang sems khru ge ba gcig 'byung pa'o //
NK100(the)004:747: de ltar rang snang yul med du thag chod pas /
NK100(the)004:748: rang snang ris med du 'char te /
NK100(the)004:750: rang shar glang mgo ba gnyis ka rang snang yin pas ris med do //
NK100(the)004:751: des 'khor 'das bzang ngan la sogs kun la 'adre'o //
NK100(the)004:752: sems stong par ngo sprad pas sems stong par thag chod de /
NK100(the)004:753: snod 'byung ba lnga yang ngos gzung med /
NK100(the)004:754: 'gro drug la yang ngos gzung med /
NK100(the)004:755: dug lnga dang dug gsum la yang ngos gzung med /
NK100(the)004:756: dus gsum sangs rgyas la yang ngos gzung med /
NK100(the)004:757: lam lta bsgom la yang ngos bzung med /
NK100(the)004:758: de ltar lta bsgom mkhan rang yang ngos bzung dang bral bar thag rbad kyis chod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:759: stong pa gnyis med du sprad pas stong pa gnyis med du thag chod pa ni /
NK100(the)004:761: bcud rigs drug /dug gsum rtog pa /
NK100(the)004:763: lam lta bsgom du snang sdo ba'i dus na ngos gzung thams cad dang bral /
NK100(the)004:764: ngos bzung dang bral ba de nyid rang snang ste /
NK100(the)004:765: de gnyis tshig tu re mos brjod kyang /
NK100(the)004:766: don la snga phyi'am bzang ngan nam /
NK100(the)004:767: 'dug pa la sogs pa la khyad par med par thag rbad kyis chod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:768: gnyis med rang grol du ngo sprad pas gnyis med rang grol du thag chod pa ni /
NK100(the)004:769: de ltar gnyis med lta bya'i yul gzhan du ma lus /
NK100(the)004:770: lta byed kyi mkhan po cig logs su ma lus pas /
NK100(the)004:772: gshis sam ngang gis rang grol chen por thag rbad kyis chod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:773: de ltar thag chod pas gol sa chod pa bzhin 'byung ste /
NK100(the)004:774: snang ba sems su shes shing rtogs pas phyi'i gol sa chod pa ni /
NK100(the)004:775: de la gol sa dang chos lugs gnyis las /
NK100(the)004:776: gol sa ni skye bo yul rang ka ma drug
NK100(the)004:777: la shes pa rang ka ma drug gis rang rgyud
NK100(the)004:779: mu stegs rtag pa ther zug tu 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)004:780: nyan thos rdul phran don dam du 'dod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:781: mdor na sems las logs pa'i yul phyi rol tu 'dzin pa gang la yang gol pa'o //
NK100(the)004:783: snang ba de sems su shes shing rtogs pas snang
NK100(the)004:784: ba rang snang la yul med pas de'i gol sa
NK100(the)004:785: chod do // sems stong par shes shing rtogs pas nang gi gol sa chod de /
NK100(the)004:786: de yang gol sa dang chod lugs gnyis las /
NK100(the)004:787: gol sa ni nyan thos rang rgyal 'dzin shes skad cig ma don dam du 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)004:788: sems tsam rang rig rang gsal don dam du 'dod pa ste /
NK100(the)004:789: mdor na rang gi sems grub par 'dod pa thams cad do //
NK100(the)004:790: chod lugs ni sems nyid ngos gzung dang bral bar rtogs par chod do //
NK100(the)004:791: stong pa gnyis med du shes shing rtogs pas gsang ba'i gol sa chod de /
NK100(the)004:792: de la yang gnyis las gol sa ni /
NK100(the)004:793: dbu ma sems tsam don dam kun rdzob gnyis su 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)004:794: phyi rgyud pa bdag dam tshig sems dpa' dang lha ye shes sems dpa' gnyis su 'dod pa ste /
NK100(the)004:795: mdor na gnyis su 'dod pa thams cad gol sa'o //
NK100(the)004:796: chod lugs ni sems gsal stong gnyis med du rtogs pas chod do //
NK100(the)004:797: gnyis med rang grol du shes shing rtogs pas mthar thug gi gol sa chod de /
NK100(the)004:798: de la gnyis la gol sa ni /
NK100(the)004:799: ma h+aa bden pa dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba don dam du 'dod pa dang /
NK100(the)004:800: a nu dbyings ye shes dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba mthar thug tu 'dod pa ste /
NK100(the)004:801: mdor na mthar thug gcig blo yul du byas na zhen pas 'dod pa thams cad do //
NK100(the)004:802: chod lugs ni mthar thug de nyid yul med rang
NK100(the)004:803: grol du rtogs pas mthar thug tu yang yul du
NK100(the)004:804: mi byed rang sar grol bas chod pa'o //
NK100(the)004:805: de ltar gol sa chod pas zhen pa bzlog pa bzhin 'byung ste /
NK100(the)004:806: snang ba sems su shes shing rtogs pas phyi yul la zhen pa mi skye ste /
NK100(the)004:807: 'khor 'das su rang sems snang ba las gzhan med pas /
NK100(the)004:808: phyi'i rang snang du shes pas /
NK100(the)004:809: zhen pa'i yul med pas zhen pa mi skye'o //
NK100(the)004:810: sems stong par shes shing rtogs pas na sems zhen pa mi skye ste /
NK100(the)004:811: sems nyid ngos bzung thams cad dang bral ba dngos
NK100(the)004:812: por ma grub pas zhen pa skye rgyu med do
NK100(the)004:813: // stong pa gnyis med du shes shing rtogs pas gnyis snang la zhen pa mi skye ste /
NK100(the)004:821: don dam dang kun rdzob la sogs pa'i rang snang mtha' dag la /
NK100(the)004:822: de dag thams cad gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas zhen pa mi skye'o //
NK100(the)004:823: gnyis med rang grol du shes shing rtogs pas sangs
NK100(the)004:824: thugs sangs rgyas la yang zhen pa mi skye ste
NK100(the)004:825: / mthar thug sangs rgyas bya ba bzang po gcig blo yul du byar med de /
NK100(the)004:826: sangs rgyas nyid kyang yul med rang grol du rtogs pas zhen pa mi skye'o //
NK100(the)004:827: spyir ngo sprod 'di la nges pa mi gda' ste /
NK100(the)004:828: gong ma de rnams shas cher mdzad nas /
NK100(the)004:829: spungs pa'i ngo sprod nyi shu rtsa gcig gam /
NK100(the)004:833: blo rigs dang sbyar nas mdzad do //
NK100(the)004:834: de yang tshig zin pas mi chog ste /
NK100(the)004:835: don bsnal ma gcig myong pa shes rgyud la skye dgos pas /
NK100(the)004:836: slob dpon slob bu'i gnyis ka'i nan tan byed pa gal che'o gsung /
NK100(the)004:837: spyir gdams ngag 'di rnams 'das pa'i dus su tshig sgros thon po mi dgos /
NK100(the)004:838: don gyi go ba blang kyi bu yis rjes la skye bar bya'o gsung ngo //
NK100(the)004:839: lta ba ngo sprod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////lta ba nyams su blangs pa ni /
NK100(the)004:840: lta ba byed spyod la gdab pa bsgom pa spyod lam la gdab pa la sogs pas /
NK100(the)004:841: spyod lam bzhi la sogs pas dus thams cad du 'bral med du nyams su blang ngo //
NK100(the)004:842: yang 'thab na bogs dbyung pa dang /
NK100(the)004:843: gol na gol sa bcad pa dang /
NK100(the)004:844: bsgrib na bsgrib pa ngos bzung pa la sogs pas lam mnyams su blang ngo //
NK100(the)004:845: lta ba nyams su blang pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////rin po che'i phyag bzhes ni /
NK100(the)004:846: tshogs gnas kyi rtags shar nas /
NK100(the)004:847: yar gyi 'phel bcu la drag rlung bcun /
NK100(the)004:848: thun grangs nyi ma re re la gnyis gnyis spel nas /
NK100(the)004:850: dmigs pa nyi ma gsum tsam gdugs la gtod /
NK100(the)004:851: de nas nyi ma gnyis su rlung sems 'dres pa la gtod do //
NK100(the)004:852: de nas nyi ma gcig ngal bso //
NK100(the)004:859: yang thun gnyis gnyis phri ste bzhag lnga mdzad /
NK100(the)004:860: de nas sems 'dzin gyi lta bsgom man ngag gsum ngo sprad /
NK100(the)004:861: thabs khyad par can la nyams len nyin gcig bya /
NK100(the)004:862: de nas bsgom pa spyod lam la gdab /
NK100(the)004:863: de nas nyams la 'di tsho khyed rang la skyes so byas la ngo sprod /
NK100(the)004:864: de nas lta ba ngo sprod mdzad do //
NK100(the)004:866: rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i lung 'ga' yang bzung zhing /
NK100(the)004:868: +thii ////chos sku rang la gnas kyang rang ngo ma shes pas /
NK100(the)004:869: thog ma med nas 'khrul lugs bsam mi khyab //
NK100(the)004:870: las 'phro sad dam bsags pa'i stobs kyis su //
NK100(the)004:871: mtshan ldan bla ma gsang sngags zab mo dang //
NK100(the)004:872: mang du mjal te thos pa bag re byas //
NK100(the)004:873: sems kyi sgro 'dogs zhig po'i drung du chod //
NK100(the)004:874: mnyam med rin po che de'i thugs kyi bcud //
NK100(the)004:875: rgyud pa bzhi ldan gdams ngag zab dgu gnang //
NK100(the)004:876: khrid kyi gdams ngag phyag bzhes len bzhi zhus //
NK100(the)004:877: rje'i phyag bzhes snyan rgyud bdag gis bris //
NK100(the)004:878: grags dang 'dod pa'i sems kyis ma yin gyis //
NK100(the)004:879: phyi rabs don dang bdag gi brjed thor bkod //
NK100(the)004:880: dar zhing rgyas nas 'gro ba 'dren par shog /bsam
NK100(the)004:881: gtan bsgom pa rnams kyi sgron mer shog /man ngag
NK100(the)004:883: la la phrag dog dbang gis smod par byed //
NK100(the)004:884: la la ras chod dbang gis lung mi nod //
NK100(the)004:885: bskal med rnams la bag tsam gsang bar bya //
NK100(the)004:886: bskal ldan rnams kyi bstan pa'i sgron mer shog //
NK100(the)004:888: khrid kyi phyag bzhes kyi yi ge /
NK100(the)004:889: rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
NK100(the)004:893: rta rin chen dpal gyi phyag dpe'o //
